name: Parade - The Arcade Game
description:
Parade is an arcade/action game where the goal is to avoid the oncoming parade.
Get as much points as possible!
a Practice game I made to learn more about Monogame engine and its capabilities.
           
In game music is originally from a Gameboy game, Game & Watch Gallery, which plays during the “Octopus” game. Its composers are Yoko Mizuta, Jin Sugita.

WASD/ARROWS MovementSPACEBARUse items when collectedENTER Pause on/offESC Hold to exit gameF   Window/Fullscreen. Works only on title- and pause screens
